description: Try our easy to follow Vegetarian Pad Thai recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Vegetarian Pad Thai Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Divide the pad thai among serving bowls. Top each bowl with coriander leaves and sliced chilli. Serve the pad thai with lime wedges.
